mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID, A.USER_NM, A.USER_IP_ADDR, A.PW_FAIL_CNT, A.LOCK_FLG, B.DB_TYPE, B.DB_HOST, B.DB_PORT, B.DB_SERVICE_NAME, B.DB_SID, B.DB_NAME, B.DB_LISTEN_TYPE, B.DB_USER, B.DB_PW FROM USER_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_DB_INFO B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND B.USE_FLG = 'Y' WHERE A.DEL_FLG = 0 AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.USER_PW = crypt(#{userPw}, A.USER_PW) ORDER BY A.USER_ID, B.SORT_NO
